errors.notplayable:
{{{errorEmoji}}} Found Track: {{{tile}}} but it's not playable in my Country
> {{{link}}}
errors.usernotloggedin:
> {{{errorEmoji}}} {{{user}}} has not synced their Account with Deezer yet.
> For more information see {{{command}}}

login.description: Connect your deezer account with this bot

execute.embedDescription: In order to interact with tracks, playlists, artists and radios you have to logged.
execute.embedFooter: Don't share this link with someone!

logout.description: Disconnect your deezer account with this bot

execute.embedDescription:
We removed your connection but dont forget. 
In order to interact with tracks, playlists, artists and radios you have to logged.

play.description: Play a song / query inside your Voice-Channel

options.pick_searchresult: Want to select the right search Result?

execute.pickedtypefoundnothing:
Picked the **{{{type}}}**: {{{link}}}
> But found no Tracks for it...

options.country_playlist: Wanna play specific Charts of a Country/Worldwide?

execute.pleaseSelectCountry: Please select your wished Country based Charts-Playlist
execute.searchingForChartTracks: Now searching for the {{{chartTracksName}}} Charts Tracks

options.add_tracks_per_fetch: How many tracks to add, per each Autoplay-fetch. (Default: 5)
options.tracks_requesting_type: Do you want to get the Tracks from your FLOW / Recommendatios?

execute.turnedoff: {{{approveEmoji}}} Turned autoplay from your recommendations off.
execute.turnedon:
{{{approveEmoji}}} Autoplay enabled
> Now playing your recommended Tracks
> Only if the __last played Track__ was requested by you.
execute.turnedon_flow:
{{{approveEmoji}}} Autoplay enabled
> Now playing your recommended Flow-Tracks, by **Deezer's Flow AI**.
> Only if the __last played Track__ was requested by you.

options.forward_amount: For how many seconds, do you want to seek forwards? (Default 20) [Overwrites rewind]
options.seek_amount: To which second to seek to? [Overwrites forward & rewind]
options.rewind_amount: For how many seconds, do you want to seek backwards?
options.replay_song: Do you want to replay the song? [Overwrites all]

skip.description: Skip the current or multiple Track(s)

options.skip_to: To which #track to skip to? (Default: #1, input just the Number)

execute.no_upcoming_tracks: {{{errorEmoji}}} No upcoming Tracks, nor is autoplay enabled.
execute.tracknotexisting: {{{errorEmoji}}} Track #{{{jumpTo}}} does not exist, the Queue is {{{queueSize}}} tracks big
